transcript.title: STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P J KEATING MP VISIT TO INDONESIA
transcript.content:
PRIME MINISTER 92/ 95
STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P J KEATING MP
VISIT TO INDONESIA
I will make a short working visit to Indonesia on 17 September 1995 following my
visit to Papua New Guinea for the South Pacific Forum and 20th anniversary
celebrations of PNG's independence.
I will meet President Soeharto to discuss the APEC meeting in Osaka in November as
well as bilateral and regional issues.
CANBERRA 29 August 1995
